name: superclaude-intelligence
description: SuperClaude Intelligence Server - Semantic Code Understanding Engine with LSP Integration

scripts.build:basic: npx tsc src/BasicServer.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2022 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:simple: npx tsc src/indexSimple.ts src/MCPServerSimple.ts src/services/Logger.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2022 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:enhanced: npx tsc src/EnhancedServer.ts src/services/Logger.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2022 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:production: npx tsc src/ProductionServer.ts src/core/LSPManagerStub.ts src/services/Logger.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2022 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:production-enhanced: npx tsc src/ProductionServerEnhanced.ts src/core/EnhancedLSPManager.ts src/core/LSPManagerStub.ts src/services/Logger.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2022 --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
